name: The Killer Sandworm from Saturn
description:
A 2.5D Action Arcade game all about chaos, destruction, and joyous mayhem!

         The goal of the game is to be fully immersed as a powerful alien Sandworm and its growth cycle as it becomes more powerful through consuming both living and non-living obstacles. However, the player must watch out for the formidable foe of all: the human race! They will attempt to hinder the Sandworm's goal of fully evolving, and subsequently, the players progress.

    Wreak havoc using strategy and acquired upgrades including speed boosts, increase in size (leading to more health), and a multitude of projectiles shot from the worm's deadly maw. At max level, the sandworm shoots an obliterating laser of sheer annihilation. The Sandworm will live for as long as that player progresses through the allotted ten waves. Aim for the highest score possible if you're seeking true global dominance.

Consume, grow, and become the greatest Sandworm ever!

Developed by team Worm off the String. Meet the team below!

Designers - Shane Tetro and Michael Silverio

Artists - Kathryn Komerska and Ben WolcottSchickler

Programmers - Andrew Hunt and Khalil Lyons

and Producer - Kendrick Ng-Yow

If you enjoyed the game, PLEASE consider following JollyCoopCo for more content or adding a comment below!
